content: this cowl takes advantage of its moebius construction to show both sides of a fpdc front post double_crochet fabric - texture plus you start with a foundation that is the length you want twist and join then work fpdc stitches in joined but not turned rounds keep going until you get the size you want no swatching i like to use a squishy or lofty yarn such as vanna s choice and a hook that is large enough to maintain the loft works equally well with worsted or chunky yarn you can ususally get away with one skein but may need a bit more easy fun and warm
